alert.note: Alert for Barton; Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 3:31AM CDT until April 23 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Russell County in central Kansas... Barton County in central Kansas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 330 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Codell to near Pfeifer to 8 miles south of Alexander, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 to 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Great Bend, Russell, Hoisington, Ellinwood, Claflin, Lucas, Gorham, Pawnee Rock, Luray, Dorrance, Albert, Olmitz, Milberger, Bunker Hill, Paradise, Galatia, Susank, Waldo, Great Bend Airport and Russell Airport. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 176 and 205. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
